name: Double Up
description:
"Double Up" has a little weird jumping mechanic and only two buttons.

Made in 48 hours for FireTruck Game Jam (July 2017).

All the things made with Game Maker Studio 1.4, sorry I didnt make sound effects or any audio at all. Work and stuff. This is all I could make. Had fun making it. Hope you like it!

Controls: W for jumping an hold it when bouncing of walls may help. S makes you fall a bit faster and on ground it turns you to face the other way. Wall bouncing is a bit weird, but you get used to it pretty quickly. Reach the goal at the top of the level and have fun.
